name: definitely not a tower defense game (Applied Math for Games Final Output)
name_original: definitely not a tower defense game (Applied Math for Games Final Output)
description:
Level Designer / Programmer - Nic Obzunar

Game Designer / QA - Monty Del Valle

*DISCLAIMER: FOR  EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY*

**NO AUDIO INCLUDED IN THIS GAME**  ;-;

definitely not a tower defense game. is definitely not a regular TD. :> 

Deploy turrets on their tiles, earn money and experience, and upgrade them to defend your base.

Controls:

 Left click: Build, upgrade or sell turrets
Arrow keys/Mouse: Pan camera
Escape: Pause menu

And a big brain to survive the polygonal onslaught lmao.

Assets Used:

Tower Defense Assets - Brackeys (http://devassets.com/assets/tower-defense-assets/)
